p: In some cases, women are advised to keep a distance from NB, though each case should be considered individually, taking into account the desires of women and their companions. Breastfeeding is recommended even among women infected with COVID-19, provided that they wear surgical masks and observe hand hygiene. When breastfeeding is impossible, mothers are recommended to express or pump breast milk. Vital signs should be rigorously assessed and symptoms of this infection identified during childcare consultations. Also, support such as medication, oxygen, and guidance concerning sleeping, resting, hydration, feeding should be provided in case of worsened symptoms, along with multidisciplinary care.
